full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 215 of 247 343 LBUCmax5 Jane - direct my attempt at being cool, I guess. Q. I want to ask you, Jane, how did you feel at the time about the attention that Epstein and Maxwell were paying to you when you were in middle school and high school? A. How did I feel about the attention? Q. Yes. A. Initially, I felt special. You know, I didn't -- I didn't really have much support or attention at home, so he was someone who was seemingly looking out for me and caring for me is how it felt. Q. Why was that important to you at the time, to feel cared about? A. Because I didn't have any family that made me feel cared about. Q. In your adult life, how has what happened to you with Maxwell and Epstein affected your relationships? MS. MENNINGER: Objection, your Honor. Relevance. THE COURT: Just a moment. MS. MENNINGER: May we have a sidebar if there is any -- THE COURT: Let's do that. (Continued on next page) (Pages 344 to 347 SEALED) SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017577
